entry.title: Despite everything, it’s still you
entry.summary:
Author: VettTrece

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,634Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 264

Summary: Bruce Wayne, lonely, distrustful, and worn down by a city that never changes, witnesses the impossible: a man flies in front of him, no wires, no tricks, no logical explanation. Superman has arrived. Not as the man from Bruce's world, but as a figure who shouldn’t have crossed the threshold.He hails from a different universe, one with different rules. A place where, according to his logic, Bruce is meant to be his soulmate.But in this Gotham, there is no destiny, there is no hope. In his home there's no room for myths.Until now.

entry.title: Two Heroes and a Baby
entry.summary:
Author: xxEmilee_Lunaxx

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,680Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 201

Summary: In this AU, 19-year-old Bruce Wayne adopts 4-year-old Dick Grayson after he is orphaned by a tragic event at Haly's Circus. Bruce is in over his head trying to juggle establishing himself as a responsible and valuable asset to Wayne Enterprises, beginning his vigilante work in Gotham as The Batman, and parenting a young child despite not knowing where to start. After struggling to get good press and constantly being seen as an irresponsible nepo baby, he sets up an interview at The Daily Planet. That's where he meets 19-year-old intern Clark Kent, who is eager to write a good story to begin his career as a journalist. After Clark agrees to keep an eye on Dick during his interview, Bruce realizes he has a knack for watching children, especially young Dick Grayson. Bruce asks Clark to come live with him at Wayne Manor on a 6 month assignment as Dick's nanny, and in return, will let Clark write the story of a lifetime--an expose on his life that no other reporter has even come close to. Clark reluctantly agrees, but is hiding a secret from Bruce--his life as the superhero, Superman! As the two begin their friendship and double lives as heroes, they learn valuable lessons in friendship, love, and parenting.

entry.title: Bruce Goes Batty
entry.summary:
Author: AtlasDaMoth

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,587Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 464

Summary: In Bruce Wayne's opinion, as The Batman and Gotham's Billionaire, magic was both incredibly illogical, and quite stupid. Guns, swords, secret plots and evil schemes, he could deal with it all. Except for magic. Spells, curses, it was all unknown to him, and he hated it.He formed that idea on the subject at least a good three years ago. And now, as he stares at himself in the mirror, shaking hands gripping the long bat ears that had sprouted upon his head, he finds himself proven right yet again.Magic. Stupid, stupid magic.

entry.title: A Shadow Of A Ghost
entry.summary:
Author: MysticRose1992

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,600Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 808

Summary: Danyal Al Ghul was the younger twin brother of Damian Al Ghul, and destined to be his brother’s right hand man, the ghost that whispered the secrets of others in his ear. Danyal was a dangerous foe to have, one that could look at you and know all of your secrets, one that could vanish right in front of you. So, it was both the saddest and the happiest day when Danyal Al Ghul and his guards disappeared, all thought to be dead, when he was ten.Danny Fenton was the quiet weird kid that the strange, eccentric Drs. Maddie and Jack Fenton found and adopted one day. He was deathly silent, and yet with one look from his piercing blue eyes he could silence you. Even with his weird aura around him, he managed to pull two of the only other weird kids into being his best friends. The three of them were inseparable and seemed to have developed their own silent communications.Danny is weirdly smart about certain things and yet seems to be failing his English class. Danny is forced to write an essay that just so happens to win his English class a week-long trip to Gotham. Surely nothing could go wrong with a group of teenagers from Amity Park and the two adults accompanying them in Gotham?
